org.mongodb.morphia.annotations

Annotation Type Collation


  • public @interface Collation
    Defines the collation options for an index
    Since:
    1.3

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String locale
      Sets the locale

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      CollationAlternate alternate
      Sets the alternate
      boolean backwards
      Sets the backwards value
      CollationCaseFirst caseFirst
      Sets the collation case first value
      boolean caseLevel
      Sets the case level value
      CollationMaxVariable maxVariable
      Sets the maxVariable
      boolean normalization
      Sets the normalization value
      boolean numericOrdering
      Sets the numeric ordering.
      CollationStrength strength
      Sets the collation strength

    • Element Detail

      • locale

        public abstract String locale
        Sets the locale
        See Also:
        ICU User Guide - Locale

      • backwards

        public abstract boolean backwards
        Sets the backwards value

        Causes secondary differences to be considered in reverse order, as it is done in the French language

        Default:
        false

      • caseLevel

        public abstract boolean caseLevel
        Sets the case level value

        Turns on case sensitivity

        Default:
        false

      • normalization

        public abstract boolean normalization
        Sets the normalization value

        If true, normalizes text into Unicode NFD.

        Default:
        false

      • numericOrdering

        public abstract boolean numericOrdering
        Sets the numeric ordering. if true will order numbers based on numerical order and not collation order
        Default:
        false

      • alternate

        public abstract CollationAlternate alternate
        Sets the alternate

        Controls whether spaces and punctuation are considered base characters

        Default:
        com.mongodb.client.model.CollationAlternate.NON_IGNORABLE

      • caseFirst

        public abstract CollationCaseFirst caseFirst
        Sets the collation case first value

        Determines if Uppercase or lowercase values should come first

        Default:
        com.mongodb.client.model.CollationCaseFirst.OFF

      • maxVariable

        public abstract CollationMaxVariable maxVariable
        Sets the maxVariable
        Default:
        com.mongodb.client.model.CollationMaxVariable.PUNCT

      • strength

        public abstract CollationStrength strength
        Sets the collation strength
        Default:
        com.mongodb.client.model.CollationStrength.TERTIARY
